3 namespace Ubiquity\cache;
4 
5 use Ubiquity\cache\traits\ModelsCacheTrait;
6 use Ubiquity\cache\traits\RestCacheTrait;
7 use Ubiquity\cache\traits\RouterCacheTrait;
8 use Ubiquity\utils\base\UFileSystem;
9 use mindplay\annotations\AnnotationCache;
10 use mindplay\annotations\AnnotationManager;
11 use mindplay\annotations\Annotations;
12 
22 class CacheManager extends RouterCacheTrait,ModelsCacheTrait,RestCacheTrait {
23 
28  public static $cache;
29  private static $cacheDirectory;
30 
31  public static function start(&$config) {
32  self::$cacheDirectory = self::initialGetCacheDirectory ( $config );
33  $cacheDirectory = \ROOT . \DS . self::$cacheDirectory;
34  Annotations::$config ['cache'] = new AnnotationCache ( $cacheDirectory . '/annotations' );
35  self::register ( Annotations::getManager () );
36  self::getCacheInstance ( $config, $cacheDirectory, ".cache" );
37  }
38 
44  public static function startProd(&$config) {
45  self::$cacheDirectory = self::initialGetCacheDirectory ( $config );
46  $cacheDirectory = \ROOT . \DS . self::$cacheDirectory;
47  self::getCacheInstance ( $config, $cacheDirectory, ".cache" );
48  }
49 
50  protected static function getCacheInstance(&$config, $cacheDirectory, $postfix) {
51  $cacheSystem = 'Ubiquity\cache\system\ArrayCache';
52  $cacheParams = [ ];
53  if (! isset ( self::$cache )) {
54  if (isset ( $config ["cache"] ["system"] )) {
55  $cacheSystem = $config ["cache"] ["system"];
56  }
57  if (isset ( $config ["cache"] ["params"] )) {
58  $cacheParams = $config ["cache"] ["params"];
59  }
60  self::$cache = new $cacheSystem ( $cacheDirectory, $postfix, $cacheParams );
61  }
62  return self::$cache;
63  }
64 
65  private static function initialGetCacheDirectory(&$config) {
66  return $config ["cache"] ["directory"] ?? ($config ["cache"] ["directory"] = "cache" . \DS);
67  }
68 
69  public static function getCacheDirectory() {
70  return self::$cacheDirectory;
71  }
72 
73  public static function getAbsoluteCacheDirectory() {
74  return \ROOT . \DS . self::$cacheDirectory;
75  }
76 
77  public static function getCacheSubDirectory($subDirectory) {
78  return \ROOT . \DS . self::$cacheDirectory . \DS . $subDirectory;
79  }
80 
81  public static function checkCache(&$config, $silent = false) {
82  $dirs = self::getCacheDirectories ( $config, $silent );
83  foreach ( $dirs as $dir ) {
84  self::safeMkdir ( $dir );
85  }
86  return $dirs;
87  }
88 
89  public static function getCacheDirectories(&$config, $silent = false) {
90  $cacheDirectory = self::initialGetCacheDirectory ( $config );
91  $rootDS = \ROOT . \DS;
92  if (! $silent) {
93  echo "cache directory is " . UFileSystem::cleanPathname ( $rootDS . $cacheDirectory ) . "\n";
94  }
95  $cacheDirectory = $rootDS . $cacheDirectory . \DS;
96  $modelsDir = str_replace ( "\\", \DS, $config ["mvcNS"] ["models"] );
97  $controllersDir = str_replace ( "\\", \DS, $config ["mvcNS"] ["controllers"] );
98  $annotationCacheDir = $cacheDirectory . "annotations";
99  $modelsCacheDir = $cacheDirectory . $modelsDir;
100  $queriesCacheDir = $cacheDirectory . "queries";
101  $controllersCacheDir = $cacheDirectory . $controllersDir;
102  $viewsCacheDir = $cacheDirectory . "views";
103  $seoCacheDir = $cacheDirectory . "seo";
104  $gitCacheDir = $cacheDirectory . "git";
105  $contentsCacheDir = $cacheDirectory . "contents";
106  return [ "annotations" => $annotationCacheDir,"models" => $modelsCacheDir,"controllers" => $controllersCacheDir,"queries" => $queriesCacheDir,"views" => $viewsCacheDir,"seo" => $seoCacheDir,"git" => $gitCacheDir,"contents" => $contentsCacheDir ];
107  }
108 
109  private static function safeMkdir($dir) {
110  if (! is_dir ( $dir ))
111  return mkdir ( $dir, 0777, true );
112  }
113 
114  public static function clearCache(&$config, $type = "all") {
115  $cacheDirectories = self::checkCache ( $config );
116  $cacheDirs = [ "annotations","controllers","models","queries","views","contents" ];
117  foreach ( $cacheDirs as $typeRef ) {
118  self::_clearCache ( $cacheDirectories, $type, $typeRef );
119  }
120  }
121 
122  private static function _clearCache($cacheDirectories, $type, $typeRef) {
123  if ($type === "all" || $type === $typeRef)
124  UFileSystem::deleteAllFilesFromFolder ( $cacheDirectories [$typeRef] );
125  }
126 
127  public static function initCache(&$config, $type = "all", $silent = false) {
128  self::checkCache ( $config, $silent );
129  self::start ( $config );
130  if ($type === "all" || $type === "models")
131  self::initModelsCache ( $config, false, $silent );
132  if ($type === "all" || $type === "controllers")
133  self::initRouterCache ( $config, $silent );
134  if ($type === "all" || $type === "rest")
135  self::initRestCache ( $config, $silent );
136  }
137 
138  public static function getAllRoutes() {
139  $routes = self::getControllerCache ();
140  return array_merge ( $routes, self::getControllerCache ( true ) );
141  }
142 
143  protected static function _getFiles(&$config, $type, $silent = false) {
144  $typeNS = $config ["mvcNS"] [$type];
145  $typeDir = \ROOT . \DS . str_replace ( "\\", \DS, $typeNS );
146  if (! $silent)
147  echo \ucfirst ( $type ) . " directory is " . \ROOT . $typeNS . "\n";
148  return UFileSystem::glob_recursive ( $typeDir . \DS . '*' );
149  }
150 
151  private static function register(AnnotationManager $annotationManager) {
152  $annotationManager->registry = array_merge ( $annotationManager->registry, [
153  'id' => 'Ubiquity\annotations\IdAnnotation',
154  'manyToOne' => 'Ubiquity\annotations\ManyToOneAnnotation',
155  'oneToMany' => 'Ubiquity\annotations\OneToManyAnnotation',
156  'manyToMany' => 'Ubiquity\annotations\ManyToManyAnnotation',
157  'joinColumn' => 'Ubiquity\annotations\JoinColumnAnnotation',
158  'table' => 'Ubiquity\annotations\TableAnnotation',
159  'transient' => 'Ubiquity\annotations\TransientAnnotation',
160  'column' => 'Ubiquity\annotations\ColumnAnnotation',
161  'validator' => 'Ubiquity\annotations\ValidatorAnnotation',
162  'transformer' => 'Ubiquity\annotations\TransformerAnnotation',
163  'joinTable' => 'Ubiquity\annotations\JoinTableAnnotation',
164  'requestMapping' => 'Ubiquity\annotations\router\RouteAnnotation',
165  'route' => 'Ubiquity\annotations\router\RouteAnnotation',
166  'get' => 'Ubiquity\annotations\router\GetAnnotation',
167  'getMapping' => 'Ubiquity\annotations\router\GetAnnotation',
168  'post' => 'Ubiquity\annotations\router\PostAnnotation',
169  'postMapping' => 'Ubiquity\annotations\router\PostAnnotation',
170  'var' => 'mindplay\annotations\standard\VarAnnotation',
171  'yuml' => 'Ubiquity\annotations\YumlAnnotation',
172  'rest' => 'Ubiquity\annotations\rest\RestAnnotation',
173  'authorization' => 'Ubiquity\annotations\rest\AuthorizationAnnotation',
174  'injected' => 'Ubiquity\annotations\di\InjectedAnnotation',
175  'autowired' => 'Ubiquity\annotations\di\AutowiredAnnotation' ] );
176  }
177 }
